ArgonTest.Name: Local proof
ArgonTest.InputSource:
module _
import Argon.Core::*
sealed trait IsEven (n: Int) <: Object end
class ZeroIsEven <: IsEven 0 public def new() end end
proc printEven(n: Int) (requires even: IsEven n): () = puts (n.to_s())
proc main(): () do proof let mut zeroIsEven: IsEven 0 = ZeroIsEven.new() printEven 0 end
